meanings.definition: The position or rank of a don
meanings.sent1: In our school, the donship of the principal is highly respected.
meanings.sent2: He aspired to achieve the donship of CEO in his company.
meanings.sent3: The donship of the class clown always brought laughter to the students.
meanings.sent4: Her donship in the music industry made her a household name.
meanings.sent5: The donship of the king was evident in his majestic presence.

meanings.definition: The act of being a don
meanings.sent1: His donship was evident in the way he carried himself with confidence.
meanings.sent2: She displayed true donship when she stood up for her beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The donship of the magician amazed the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent4: His donship on the basketball court made him a star player.
meanings.sent5: The donship of the leader inspired others to follow in his footsteps.

meanings.definition: The qualities or characteristics of a don
meanings.sent1: Her donship shone through in her ability to lead with grace.
meanings.sent2: The donship of a true gentleman lies in his kindness and respect.
meanings.sent3: The donship of the chef was evident in the delicious flavors of his dishes.
meanings.sent4: His donship in negotiation skills always led to successful deals.
meanings.sent5: The donship of the artist was reflected in the beauty of his creations.
